title: 2001 Cart-Away Cement Mixing Trailer
item_description:
Cart-Away Cement Mixing Trailer

Trailer Details

  • VIN #: 4MFMA15231W001343
  • Year: 2001
  • Make: Cart Away
  • License: 1WY6332
    • Expiration Date: 6/30/2027

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 188”
  • Overall Width: 67”
  • Overall Height: 84”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Select One
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 227/75R15
  • Electric Plug Type: 4-Way Flat
  • Hitch: Select One

Note: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
